argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rehalfcld.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) |
| 2 |  | lt2halvesd.2 | |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) |
| 3 |  | lt2halvesd.3 | |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) |
| 4 |  | lt2halvesd.4 | |- ( ph -> A < ( C / 2 ) ) |
| 5 |  | lt2halvesd.5 | |- ( ph -> B < ( C / 2 ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_lt2halves | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR ) -> ( ( A < ( C / 2 ) /\ B < ( C / 2 ) ) -> ( A + B ) < C ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 6 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( A < ( C / 2 ) /\ B < ( C / 2 ) ) -> ( A + B ) < C ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 5, 7 | #P_mp2and | |- ( ph -> ( A + B ) < C ) |
